recipes.label: Rush A Ritual for Quick Power
recipes.startdescription: If I bring the right trappings to a place with the right ambiance, I could perform a ritual to give myself great power. The actions I'd take might be...peculiar, and raise the suspicion of the general public.

recipes.label: Perform a covert Grail ritual in a Tempting Space
recipes.startdescription: I have brought my implements, and the atmosphere is charged and ready.

recipes.label: Perform a covert Grail ritual in a Tempting Space
recipes.startdescription: What I must consume in this ritual is not considered appetizing by most, so I can expect attention from strangers whether I complete the ritual successfully or am interrupted
recipes.description: Music brightens, Influence blossoms. As I take the last morsel in my mouth and swallow, a shiver passes through the room, as all eyes strain to catch a glimpse of me.
